Package ch.epfl.lis.sde

Implements methods to numerically integrate stochastic differential equations (SDEs).

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Euler This class implements the explicit Euler-Maruyama method (only for Ito scheme, strong order of convergence 0.5) The iterative Euler method is given by the formula [1] Xn+1 =Â Xn + Fn*h + Gn*dWn (Euler) where h is the integration step size.
Main This class illustrates the functionalities of the SDE package.
Milstein This class implements the explicit Milstein solver with strong convergence order of 1.0.
Sde This class represents a system of stochastic differential equations (SDE).
SdeSettings Offers global parameters (settings) and functions used by the classes of the the SDE package.
SdeSolver This class serves as basis for the implementation of a SDE solver.
SdeSolverFactory This class allows to instantiate easily SDE solvers.
TestFunction Test function to test SDE solvers.
 

Package ch.epfl.lis.sde Description

Implements methods to numerically integrate stochastic differential equations (SDEs).

Package Specification

Compatible with the Java versions 1.5+.
